channel.title: How can i make agility level to 99 when a new player starts?
channel.description: I cant find any agility objects to place any where so im saying fuck it and just giving 99 agility when players log in. Any help would be appreciated! Thanks! Also, im running a 317 on pk planet base, how do i delete the censor that bashar put on there? its ridiculous, its blocks the word "noob"

i fixed the problems, thanks guys for the help

item.title: How can i make agility level to 99 when a new player starts?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

ugh, alright. Now when i log in as a new player i get my items that i had but i cant move. I log out then back in a my starter triples itself and than i can move… lol any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make agility level to 99 when a new player starts?

item.title: How can i make agility level to 99 when a new player starts?
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

jal knight:

thanks alot! it worked but it fucked somethin up :/. When a new player started they would have items in their inventory now they dont :/. Any ideas?

Yeah, do this:

if(starter == 0){ apset = true; addSkillXP(15000000, 17); addItem(995,100000); //gives 100k starter += 1; }

So add lines of

addItem(itemID,amount);

Welcome

item.title: How can i make agility level to 99 when a new player starts?
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

Add this in client.java (source)

if(starter == 0){ apset = true; addSkillXP(15000000, 17); starter += 1; }

Search for } else if (token.equals("character-spec")) { <-- or something else

and add this under it:

} else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

now search for characterfile.write("character-spec = ".
and under it add:

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length());

Tell me if it dont work.

Read full topic
